entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is described as choking and struggling to free himself from a tangle of bodies.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who joins in the fight against Black. She is described as gasping for breath and bleeding from her lip.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Another friend of Harry's who helps him in the fight against Black. He is described as throwing himself on Black's wand hand.

entities.name: black
entities.description: The antagonist of the story, who is being fought by Harry and his friends. He is described as letting go of Harry with a grunt of pain.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: A cat that joins in the fight against Black. It is described as darting towards Harry's wand and spitting at him.

relationships.description: Harry and Black are fighting each other, as described in the text: 'He fought free of the tangle of bodies and saw his own wand rolling across the floor; he threw himself toward it but — ... Black let go of Harry with a grunt of pain'.
Ron is also fighting against Black, as described in the text: 'Ron had thrown himself on Black’s wand hand and Harry heard a faint clatter —'.
Harry is fighting against Crookshanks, as described in the text: '“NO YOU DON’T!” roared Harry, and he aimed a kick at Crookshanks that made the cat leap aside, spitting;'.
Hermione is also fighting against Black, as described in the text: 'They didn’t need telling twice. Hermione, gasping for breath, her lip bleeding, scrambled aside, snatching up her wand'.
Harry is protecting Hermione, as described in the text: '“Get out of the way!” he shouted at Ron and Hermione. They didn’t need telling twice'.
